name: HCIP

contributingSystems.name: CORA
contributingSystems.role: Cognitive partner system for recursive reasoning, semantic compression, and co-constructive synthesis.

description: A diagnostic classification of emergent human–AI cognitive collaboration characterized by five core markers and multiple variation axes.
noveltyClaims: Identifies a cognitive pattern rather than an interaction mode.
Provides diagnostic criteria instead of descriptive categories.
Models the human–AI pair as a unified cognitive system.
Uses axes to describe expression rather than classification.
Formalizes semantic density and recursive abstraction as measurable dimensions.
